divs: Sighting DetailsWe were spending the weekend on lake McClure on a friends houseboat. Myself and three others were sleeping on top of the houseboat on the upper deck. I awoke around 12:15am, after relieving myself I sat down lite a smoke and was watching the stars. An object moveing in the sky caught my attention. I started watching this object as it travled from one star to another. After watching this for about thirty minutes, I woke up my wife. Without telling her what she was looking for, I told her where to look and tell me if she saw anything. The next thing she said is honey what is that up there? I told her to watch it. I have been watching it for almost an hour now, it goes from that star there over to that one and after about four or five minutes it goes back. Now I have no way of knowing how far apart those stars were, what I did was hold my arm out at full length and by holding up my index and little finger about four inches apart. I could put one finger on one star and one on the other. We watched this object go back and forth for at least three hours. I would not even bother to write to you about this except for one thing. I was back fishing at lake Mc Clure in 2000. I got up in the middle of the night in hopes the object might still be going back and forth. Well it was. Still going back and forth just like a shuttle bus. Al Groo
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Merced
There were no other sightings in Merced on or around July 4th 1977
Summary: The object travled between two stars, back and forth for hours.
